title: grahammiranda13
author: grahammiranda13
content: As the Title Says. Ask for a Wordpress premium or theme and I will give it to you 100% Original. It is not Cracked and not nulled. 100% From the Developer. 100% Hash Match. Post below and I will upload it. Also, Starting from $9 20K+ Original Teams and Plugins 100% Original

comments.body: I have been getting a lot of PMs!PLEASE POST HERE!!Not on PM!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: what about the future update of these themes that you offer? Does every new update have to go through you each new update have to be uploaded manually or it is possible for it to be automatic?

comments.author: grahammiranda13
comments.body: For the Free Version you mean? I have not decided yet. If you ask for an update I will give you but the free version is not automatic.The paid version is 99% Automatic. If the Developers allow API and automatic then yes. If not then we have to manually update it.Since we have signed up for all their newsletters/changelogs we know when updates happen and usually update in an hour or definitely the same day (even weekends)

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: grahammiranda13 on March 08, 2023, 11:29:56 AMFor the Free Version you mean? I have not decided yet. If you ask for an update I will give you but the free version is not automatic.The paid version is 99% Automatic. If the Developers allow API and automatic then yes. If not then we have to manually update it.Since we have signed up for all their newsletters/changelogs we know when updates happen and usually update in an hour or definitely the same day (even weekends)So, I would still have to get the files from you (not automatically from the vendors) in order to do the update? I'm talking about some solid popular WP themes which are regularly updated, with various changes that are happening an update is highly desirable. in this whole business, having an intermediary is just an additional waste of time.

Just to be kind!If you are talking about the paid version (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5442653.0) you will get 100% Automatic updates that you can download DIRECTLY via the Panel you will get access to that is 100% Directly from the developer. It is all automatic. and it is $9 for 20K Original Plugins and Themes!

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: grahammiranda13 on March 25, 2023, 08:14:38 PMQuote from: balotelli on March 17, 2023, 02:42:49 PMHi, is this include Item Purchase Code from themeforest?What do you mean? if it is activated?Usually, when you buy themes on Themeforest, a license is obtained, that is, a license code that needs to be entered to activate and enable all the resources and features (regular updates) of the same theme. so an excellent question is how that part works. (you probably know what balotelli wanted to ask)For example, I need these themes https://themeforest.net/item/mylisting-directory-listing-wordpress-theme/20593226 probably for two or even three different domains. So, let me explain how things going on here in this case.Just to mention, I already have this theme from a similar service offer like yours, but it's not updateable and now it's going to be useless since I haven't the latest updates which brings me certain limitations, eg support for updating to the new PHP 7.4+.
